attributes.action: Please help to stop Leicestershire County Council evicting 7 vulnerable adults.
attributes.background: 7 vulnerable adults are facing losing their home due to Leicestershire’s short term respite needs. This means 7 adults, some with little or no family will be forced to leave their home that they have lived in for 6+ years and where they have bonded and made great friendships.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. We understand that you are concerned about the individuals in this situation, but adult social care is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

https://www.leicestershire.gov.uk/about-the-council/how-the-council-works/public-involvement/petitions
